title: Henrietta Who?
description: Larking was a typical English village and, like a thousand similar villages, it also had its secrets. Inspector C.D. Sloan was soon to discover that point after the postman found the body of Grace Jenkins in the road that led to her thatched cottage. She had been murdered.But the real mystery involved Grace's daughter Henrietta. No one could really explain exactly who Henrietta was.
author: Catherine Aird
